title: FREE information and help to buy a home! Down payment assistance. DPA
posting_body: ['I am a licensed Realtor working with Bridge Realty.', 'I work with a lot of people and have partnered with some great loan officers.', 'There are down payment assistance programs for people with good credit and steady income.', 'If you are thinking about buying a home, and have been holding off in order to save a up a down payment, there are loan programs available (for those who qualify), allowing you to buy a home with as little as $1500 out of pocket.', 'You no longer need to save up thousands of dollars to buy a home.', 'We specialize in in helping first time home buyers!', 'Here is a link to my website with all of the information available to you for FREE, just fill out the form with your information and you will know what programs area available in your specific area:', '<URL>', 'Now is a great time to buy a home.', 'Interest rates are still low and making homes affordable.', 'All you need to do is send me an email and give me your contact information, and your phone number.', 'I will call you, and we can talk about the qualifications.', 'I can also introduce you to a loan officer that can help.', 'The best part is, all of this information and help is FREE to you.', 'My name is Steve Ersfeld and I work with Bridge Realty.', 'I am a licensed Realtor in the state of MN and WI.', 'Please send me an email with your phone number and email address, and I will respond as soon as possible, you can also call me at:', 'show contact info', '.', 'If your property is now listed with a REALTOR or Broker, please disregard this offer, as it is not our intention to solicit the offerings of other REALTORS or Brokers.']
